Type: Beef Jerky
Price: 7.99

This is one of our best jerky flavors and it's gluten-free! I know it isn’t traditional, but shouldn’t jerky have a character of its own? We make this for Knotts Berry Farm each year when they have their Boysenberry Festival and for private label clients.

entry.title: Korean BBQ Brisket Beef Jerky - GLUTEN FREE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tender Heifer Snack Co
Type: Beef Jerky

Korean Barbecue Beef Jerky

Savor the taste of Korea’s popular dish. Korean BBQ beef jerky is SO good!

This beef jerky showcases the use of Korean barbecue sauce as a main ingredient – we blend it up with a few more spices to create it according to our unique recipe to bring the best flavor from the jerky.

Grab a bite and relish the authentic Korean barbecue taste as you chew on this tender, juicy jerky – eat it along with your favorite drink. All you need is a bowl of steaming rice to turn this snack into a meal!

Savor the flavor now by adding this new jerky to your cart!

entry.title: Carolina Reaper Brisket Beef Jerky
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tender Heifer Snack Co
Type: Beef Jerky
Price: 4.35 - 17.99 (3 variants)

Carolina Reaper Beef Jerky - Brisket Beef Jerky

If you have the guts, literally, and want to get a taste of the world’s hottest pepper in beef jerky, then you’ve come to the perfect place. We’ve added it to our Original flavor to create this flaming hot jerky.

This jerky is not for the faint of heart – novice consumers should take it easy when they partake in the world's hottest jerky. 

We blended our premium beef jerky with Carolina Reaper peppers – a true savage known to be the cause of tears (and fears) around the world. People who love throat-searing, lava-like heat will take a liking to this smoking hot jerky.

Know a friend who’s into the hot stuff? Share the spice with your buddy – be sure to have a glass of milk ready; you never know when the heat will take you down!

entry.title: Garlic Pepper Brisket Beef Jerky - GLUTEN FREE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tender Heifer Snack Co
Type: Beef Jerky

Garlic Pepper Flavor Brisket Beef Jerky - (GLUTEN FREE)

Got a craving for some garlic flavored beef jerky right now? Satisfy it with this irresistible garlic pepper flavored jerky!

People who just can’t resist the charm of garlic will love this jerky’s flavor profile. The lean beef is paired with our special garlic marinade – you’ll definitely feel its strong earthy and pungent taste with every bite; it even has a sprinkle of garlic chunks!

Got a trip with your friends this weekend? Bring a pack (or two) of this tender jerky – share its irresistible goodness to your squad!

Order these flavorful treats now by adding it to your cart!

entry.title: Oh, That's Hot - Cayenne Pepper Brisket Beef Jerky
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tender Heifer Snack Co
Type: Beef Jerky
Price: 4.25 - 16.99 (3 variants)

“Oh, That's Hot” Cayenne Pepper Brisket Beef Jerky 

You love heat but tend to lean towards the shallower end of the scale? Then we have some smoking hot, cayenne pepper seasoned beef jerky waiting for you.

People who love the heat will love this spiced up jerky. It has a sweet, smoky, juicy and spicy taste that is “oh so hot” – its heat kicks in later after your first bite, giving it waves of flavor that will captivate your taste for spicy treats.

The jerky’s spicy take also packs a secret – cayenne peppers can stimulate your body’s circulation, reduce acidity and more. It’s a snack that’s tasty and healthy at the same time.

Fans also bought: Ghost Pepper, Mango Habanero

entry.title: Western Barbecue Bacon Jerky - GLUTEN FREE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tender Heifer Snack Co
Type: Bacon Jerky
Price: 4.25 - 7.99 (2 variants)

Western Barbecue Bacon Jerky (GLUTEN FREE)

Want to get your hands on a pack of delicious gluten-free Western BBQ bacon jerky? Check out this smoky jerky with a taste that’s right off the grill.

This bacon jerky packs a real punch. Its meat is blended with a mixture of spices that bring out the jerky’s true light – the synergy between the ingredients create the authentic barbecue flavor that everybody loves. Plus, it is made using an old fashion recipe to give it a classic texture and taste.

Got a planned TV series binge watching tonight? Get a hold of this bacon jerky – pair it with some beer and you’re all set.

Fans also bought: Maple bacon, Sriracha and Smokey Applewood

NO COST TIP: Next time your cooking or tossing protein on the grill, be sure to wrap your meat with some bacon for an unexpected flavor boost!

entry.title: Maple Bacon Jerky - GLUTEN FREE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tender Heifer Snack Co
Type: Bacon Jerky
Price: 4.25 - 7.99 (2 variants)

Maple Bacon Jerky (GLUTEN FREE)

Nothing beats the original taste of old fashioned maple syrup. Our bacon jerky features an all-original recipe with maple syrup and honey – it has a smoky sweet taste that’s made just right; perfect for people who love the distinct flavor of classic bacon jerky. Moreover, it is completely gluten-free – ideal for those who have special dietary conditions.

Going camping for the next few days? Bring a pack of this premium bacon jerky – eat it as it is or match them with grilled meat for a surprisingly delicious meal!

Get a pack of these tasty treats – add them to your cart today!

entry.title: Smoky Sriracha Brisket Beef Jerky
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tender Heifer Snack Co
Type: Beef Jerky
Price: 4.35 - 8.10 (2 variants)

Smoky Sriracha 

Are you into spicy food? Get your hands on this Sriracha brisket beef jerky – its unique Thai touch is combined with our premium beef’s smoky flavor.

This premium jerky features the heat as its focal point. Its lean meat is seasoned with varied spices then blended with Sriracha sauce – its irresistible flavor is taken to the next level with our old fashion recipe.

Need some finger food as you watch some movies? Grab a pack – relish the jerky’s perfect beefy-smoky-spicy combination with every bite.

Get a taste of how Thai’s define spicy food – add this smoking hot jerky to your cart today.

Teriyaki Brisket Beef Jerky

Yearning for a uniquely salty-sweet flavored jerky that you can’t find anywhere else? Get this teriyaki beef brisket jerky.

It is perfect for people who have a soft spot for salty-sweet treats. The jerky’s lean meat is grilled with a glaze of teriyaki sauce made from choice ingredients and is blended with our old fashion recipe – a single bite will take you on a roller coaster ride of flavors and wonder.

Whether you’re on a trip with your family or simply on a movie marathon with yourself, this delicious treat has your back – savor its mouth-watering taste anywhere, anytime.
